channel.title: proFUN!dity podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: Nothing is so serious that it can't be talked about in a silly way, and nothing is so serious that it can't be talked about in a serious way.
channel.itunes:author: Andrew Whipple
channel.itunes:summary: Nothing is so serious that it can't be talked about in a silly way, and nothing is so serious that it can't be talked about in a serious way. Noted 'Favorite Snarky White Guy' Andrew Whipple rambles about life, pop culture, science, philosophy, comedy, tech, and coffee for about an hour every week.
channel.description: Nothing is so serious that it can't be talked about in a silly way, and nothing is so serious that it can't be talked about in a serious way. Noted 'Favorite Snarky White Guy' Andrew Whipple rambles about life, pop culture, science, philosophy, comedy, tech, and coffee for about an hour every week.
channel.itunes:keywords: whipple, technology, ramble, monologue, pop culture, philosophy

item.title: Episode #2: The Aaron Sorkin Of Podcasts
item.itunes:author: Andrew Whipple
item.itunes:subtitle: The Aaron Sorkin Of Podcasts.
item.itunes:summary:
Tonight is a cold night in the end of January, and I decide to start a podcast.
